website_summaries.verdict: Eyeshadow trios of good quality that can be used together or alone.
pros: Creamy consistency that is easy to blend
Includes a shade designed for the eyelid, crease, and brow bone
cons: Not always ideal for darker skin tones

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t find in the stores like this anymore, came as promised, not broken, and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Dawne

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the first time buying this product, but the first time buying on amazon. It came perfectly and well wrapped to make sure the makeup didn’t break. It looks just like the picture and apples great. It’s cheaper on amazon but has the perfect quality as if purchased elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Beside that great stuff. Doesn't go on chunky but has a ...
customer_reviews.text: The proportions are off. I always run out of the cream bottom color first. Beside that great stuff. Doesn't go on chunky but has a soft smooth shimmer
customer_reviews.author: Kamalicious19

customer_reviews.title: Not for women of color in my case, I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: Not for women of color in my case, I'm fairly tan and unfortunately only the crease color shows up, and it's not that dark. The other colors don't do much. I'd look for darker, more pigmented shadows.
customer_reviews.author: Ti Tra

customer_reviews.title: Works great - The middle color is a really brown color ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great - The middle color is a really brown color - but I am ok with that - they are all three really pretty shades -
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: The brand recently updated their formula, and it’s just not the same as this creamy set.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to expensive products.
customer_reviews.text: The colors on this palette work well together. I was looking for something simple and it was a bit more shimmery than I expected but the quality is good. I also found the bottom color for the “eyelid” to be a lot more pink than I expected but it didn’t look as ridiculous as I’d imagined. Overall its a good alternative to more expensive eyeshadows. The colors also seem to last through the day.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: colors are nice but product fell apart completely in one of the colors after 2nd use
customer_reviews.author: maxistopdog

customer_reviews.title: Love the creamy pink
customer_reviews.text: Love the creamy pink. The brown is not dark enough for my liking. Over all it's a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charna VF

customer_reviews.title: Great job!
customer_reviews.text: The Seller makes Sure to wrap the product pretty well to prevent damage.
customer_reviews.author: noelia

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral shadows
customer_reviews.text: This is an essential in my make up bag. These three shadows are all I need to create really flattering day and simple evening looks when I want to carry a small amount of products with me or for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, glad to have found it as no longer available in my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Julia H. Mensing

customer_reviews.title: Great Trio!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite eye shadow pallet. I've had this since February and I use it at least 2 times a week and I've hardly put a dent in my. Very pigmented and natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: pingtori

customer_reviews.title: Good palette
customer_reviews.text: Great color palette and the colors last throughout the day. It looks like it should last a while, although I would never use the brushes that came with it. Get your own brushes as they are pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Andres

customer_reviews.title: Great combo
customer_reviews.text: One of the eyeshadows is completely broke up on the inside however love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Blythe Kirksey

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeshadow for everyday
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeshadow for everyday! I'm a brunette with hazel eyes and I love the way these colors look on me.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie O.

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: Since they is shimmer touch, they seldom clarifies, but since all of these 3 colors become cool eyes, they is good for time, such as summer!
customer_reviews.author: mikan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eye shadow and for the cost, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love this for travelling
customer_reviews.text: Three simple colours that work so well together! Love this for travelling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in envelope completely busted and not usable. Do not order
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Woody

customer_reviews.title: this is amazing i wear this almost every time i go out
customer_reviews.text: this is amazing i wear this almost every time i go out ..... creamy pigmented though the middle shade looks darker in picture
customer_reviews.author: ramisatasnum

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I really like it
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and pigmented, but half the bottom came broken. Other than that I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Wet 'n' Wild eye shadow trio
customer_reviews.text: I like it alot. Smaller than I thought it would be and the colors are sheer but they're nice :)
customer_reviews.author: Yamile

customer_reviews.title: The products was received in a terrible condition and was completely smashed
customer_reviews.text: The products was received in a terrible condition and was completely smashed. There is no return option for this product also! Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pissed off.
customer_reviews.text: I am completley pissed off right now. I orded this about a MONTH ago. Finally comes after a month of waiting and whole thing is shattered. nothing in there. Weird that it was sealed so well but everything cracks. Also, they sent me hair barrets? Not like I can complain for recieving something extra but just suspicious that I got something I didnt order nor do I want. I am so pissed. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors! I saw this eyeshadow on a bridal ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors! I saw this eyeshadow on a bridal makeup tutorial. They are absolutely beautiful colors and work together well for a done up yet natural look. They have a slight bit of shimmer, but not too much. With eye primer, you only have to apply once. You will always get a better application using nicer brushes, but the tiny ones do the job if needed. I am light skinned and they look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera Singley

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite color pallet from W&W. I have some very pricey shadow pallets from high end retailers and I keep coming back to this one. The only thing it lacks is a 4th, darker, color for the outer V of the eyelid. I have the Silent Treatment pallet as well and use the crease color from that pallet. It would be nice if this pallet had that 4th color but honestly, I'm perfectly happy with it without the addition color.
customer_reviews.author: MLW

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on amazon after I could no longer find it at Walmart. It is fabulous! Does break easy, but well worth the money and I do purchase the expensive stuff too! Sad this product is no longer available! I purchased several prior to the product being discontinued and gifted them. Now I wish I would have kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does not irritate the skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and cannot wear most eyeshadows as they irritate. This one does not irritate. Will buy again. Very natural tones.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good neutral colors.
customer_reviews.text: The pink is much more flesh-toned (at least for me) than I expected, and the brown for your crease is more tannish in person. That being said, the colors still are very nice and put together well. I was actually *COMPLIMENTED* on my eye shadow as I wore this! That's never happened before! I use neutrals for work since I'm in more of a holistic profession, and these are neutral enough to wear and not look crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Love these colors
customer_reviews.text: I love the shadows I can’t find them in the store and that’s why I buy it on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent colors at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: This eyeshadow set is a beautiful set of colors at a reasonable price. As with the eyebrow pencils their long-lasting and look great. I've had a hard time finding walking on eggshells but finally with Amazon I found them!
customer_reviews.author: LADYBUG

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t live without it
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite eyeshadow since I started wearing makeup. It’s so affordable and the shades are very neutral and easy to work with. This is a staple in my makeup collection and always will be.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Hartz

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeshadow I've ever purchased. I've tried hundreds and always come back to this.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna West

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my coloring!
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette. I actually mostly use just two of the shades...on my lids and brow.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Watkins Gould

customer_reviews.title: Yay!!
customer_reviews.text: The package came 2 days after I ordered it!(which is a huge bonus) i was also pleased with the fact that the seller emailed me saying thank you. Amazing customer service. Anyways, The package came tightly and safely wrapped. It's awesome to see that, especially in makeup like eyeshadow so the makeup doesn't shatter or anything. The colors were gorgeous and with a swatch of My primer underneath stayed on for a long Time. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: This eyeshadow is AMAZING! And it’s cheap
customer_reviews.text: This eyeshadow is AMAZING! And it’s cheap! It lasts all day on my eyes with a primer. The light pink is great dupe (if not better) than my Naked Palette’s “sin” color. It blends like a dream. Get this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a natural look
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, natural looking. Goes on fast and looks good all day. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Just enough metallic to look nice but not annoyingly sparkle-y
customer_reviews.text: Just enough metallic to look nice but not annoyingly sparkle-y. I use a different brush than what is provided though.
customer_reviews.author: Elysse Estelle

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I love these colors and they brush on like cream!
customer_reviews.author: Kwinkie

customer_reviews.title: Another win
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest. There isn't a whole heck of a difference between this and Sweet As Candy. So we have the brow highlighter in a completely acceptable bone-ish colour, the crease is a shimmery brown and the lid shade is a pearly buff which reads like a very pale rose. They're buttery, they're pigmented and they blend beautifully. Soooo....well, there's only so much you can do before you end up reviewing two palettes using the same terminology! So just buy it already knowing that it's decent stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: High end quality
customer_reviews.text: Beatiful, creamy and pigmented shadows. A cult favorite of many make-up artists.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Moncayo

customer_reviews.title: Love Wet N Wild brand and quality of eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: Love Wet N Wild brand. I've been using the larger palette which is just gorgeous but I decided to throw this in my Amazon basket too. This is smaller and more nude natural colors for day wear and I really love the quality of the eye shadow. I love my Urban Decay too but it's so so expensive and yes it's higher quality but if you use the right brush and a nice eye lid primer, you will be able to make this eye shadow work well.
customer_reviews.author: Farnoosh Brock

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was advertised. It came very quickly. The colors are very pretty and pigmented.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Klayman

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: This is OK but actually much bigger than it looks in the photo. Which is great from a quantity perspective, it will last for a long time. However, I wanted a palette for travel and this is a little big for my makeup bag. The colors are nice, quality is good, and apply well with little fall-out.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen G

customer_reviews.title: Ehh. But it's a DUPE for some colors to Naked Palette!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Wet N' WIld Eye Shadow, but I kinda don't use these colors but I have my other palette and they are much better and has more beautiful colors. This one was eh. But I did hear that this was a dupe for some of the colors to Naked Palette. Sooo. If you want that, then yeah I recommend getting this for cheaper price. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wet & Wild Coloricon Eye Shadow Walking On Eggshells No. 380b, 0.8 Ounce
product_meta.description: Wet N' Wild Coloricon Eye Shadow Walking on Eggshells #380B. High pigmentation and pearl density, create an exclusive, satiny texture that lasts and lasts. A multitalented compilation of classic and tendency shades can be easily worn alone or playfully, assortment for a diversity of looks. (0.12 oz)
